DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control trial ( RCT ) 2 patient navigator condition : PN+ usual PN ( condition 1 ) evaluate efficacy culturally tailored PN program ( `` PN+ '' ) improve quality life ( QoL ) , screen practice treatment follow-up compliance among breast HL survivor . In usual PN , participant receive information brochure breast cancer survivorship minimum 1 contact patient navigator .
DOC.brief_title: Komen Breast Cancer Survivor Health Screening Promotion Project : Staying Healthy
DOC.detailed_description: This RCT involve 2 ( group ) 2 ( time ) repeat measure design experimental condition ( specialized PN+cancer survivorship program 6 month versus PN ( control condition ) between-groups factor , time-point ( baseline pre-randomization post-PN 6 month follow-up ) within-groups factor . This RCT involve 2 patient navigator condition : PN+ usual PN ( condition 1 ) evaluate efficacy culturally tailored PN program ( `` PN+ '' ) improve quality life ( QoL ) , screen practice treatment follow-up compliance among breast HL survivor . In usual PN , participant receive information brochure breast cancer survivorship minimum 1 contact patient navigator .
DOC.criteria: report primary diagnosis breast cancer complete primary treatment within past 36 month evidence verbal fluency English Spanish selfidentify HL Exclusion Criteria evidence metastatic disease current severe mental illness psychosis substance dependence within past year active suicidality ongoing neoadjuvant therapy unavailable followup course study period
